name: Urushi Constrictor
movement: 30 ft. walk, 30 ft. climb, 30 ft. swim
description: The Urushi Constrictor is a large, formidable creature with its skin embedded with poisonous leaves and vines, making it appear as part of the jungle itself.
memorable: Its ability to inflict poison and disease while being a stealthy ambusher in jungle terrain makes it a dangerous opponent.
goals: To ambush and constrict prey in its jungle environment.
relations: Typically found alone or may inhabit territories near other jungle creatures.
environment: Dense jungle areas where it can utilize its camouflage for ambush.
strengths: Stealthy ambusher, immunity to bludgeoning and poison damage.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack options including powerful bites and constriction that grapples and poisons.
most_powerful_ability: Urushi Blight disease, inflicting debilitating effects on creatures.
senses: Has blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to sense creatures in close proximity.
skills: Average detection abilities with a passive perception of 13.
additional_information: Possesses Jungle Camouflage for enhanced stealth in jungle terrain.
Can inflict 7 poison damage with contact from its skin.
Has a high Constitution, making it resilient in combat.
Infected targets of Urushi Blight suffer significant disadvantages.
Can grapple and restrain targets while inflicting additional poison damage.
test_queries: jungle monster that grapples and constricts
creature with poisonous leaves and blight
